subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Sam Querrey, a 19-year-old from California, defeated James Blake, 7-6 (10), 6-7 (7), 7-6 (7), to reach the semifinals of an ATP hardcourt tournament yesterday in Indianapolis. Querrey had 34 aces, including nine in a row over three games of the second set. Querrey advanced to play third-seeded Dmitry Tursunov of Russia. Top-seeded Andy Roddick and Frank Dancevic of Canada play in the other semifinal.
